title: The Gentle Giant Elephant
description: Elephants are the largest land animals, known for their large ears, long trunks, and tusks. They are highly intelligent, social animals that live in complex family structures.

questions.question: What is the primary purpose of an elephant's trunk?
What are an elephant's tusks made of?
Which of the following is NOT true about an elephant's ears?
options: They are used to regulate body temperature
They are a sign of the elephant's age
They can cool the elephant down
questions.correct_answer: They are a sign of the elephant's age
